item.title: Deploying Static Websites with Hugo & GoDaddy
item.description: Hugo + Netlify + GoDaddy _How to create a Hugo Website Hugo is a potent static website creator created in the GO programming language. You may use it to construct uncluttered, up-to-date websites with minimum overhead that load rapidly. Buying a domain in GoDaddy Downloading your favorite hugo theme in local repository with Github Deploying the website in Netlify Magic âœ¨ You generally don’t want to spend a lot of time building a website that will be straightforward and content-driven.
